Title: Relates to requiring health insurance providers to cover the costs of colorectal cancer screenings for individuals age 45 and older
Summary: Requires health insurance providers to cover the costs of colorectal cancer screenings and follow-up examinations for positive screenings for individuals age 45 and older.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurance providers to cover the costs of colorectal cancer screenings
